ose prior to making offer that non-compete will be required and must provide copy of non-compete at least 3 days before it must be signed

Maryland

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: Employee must earn more than $24 per hour, or $49
